languages.text: {n}Вы знаете, чье имя не договорила Инцендия — в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}своей прошлой жизни{/d} вы не раз слышали его. Аспис Чорда — Вольный Торговец Простора Коронус, заработавшая себе репутацию безжалостной и жадной грабительницы, едва ли отличающейся от еретиков-пиратов. Поразительно, но, кажется, Инцендия Бастаал-Чорда приходится ей... родственницей?{/n}

{n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы знаете, чье имя не договорила Инцендия — в {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}своей прошлой жизни{/d} вы не раз слышали его. Аспис Чорда — Вольный Торговец Простора Коронус, заработавшая себе репутацию безжалостной и жадной грабительницы, едва ли отличающейся от еретиков-пиратов. Поразительно, но, кажется, Инцендия Бастаал-Чорда приходится ей... родственницей?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was barely different from an ordinary pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was barely different from an ordinary pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

{n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous savez quel nom Incendia était sur le point de citer, vous l'avez entendu plus d'une fois au cours de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}ancienne vie{/d} : celui d'Aspyce Chorda, une libre-marchande des Étendues de Koronus. Une pillarde cupide et sans merci à la réputation infâme, à peine différente d'une pirate ou d'une hérétique lambda. Bien que rien ne le laisse présager quand on voit Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, il semble qu'elle soit apparentée à Aspyce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous savez quel nom Incendia était sur le point de citer : celui d'Aspyce Chorda, une libre-marchande des Étendues de Koronus. Une pillarde cupide et sans merci à la réputation infâme, à peine différente d'une pirate ou d'une hérétique lambda. Bien que rien ne le laisse présager quand on voit Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, il semble qu'elle soit apparentée à Aspyce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你知道因森蒂娅差点脱口而出谁的名字，这个名字你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}曾经{/d}听过无数次——是阿斯拜丝·库尔达。她是科罗努斯扩区的行商浪人，也是臭名昭著的劫掠者，极其无情、贪婪，与普通的海盗与异端分子几乎没什么不一样。因森蒂娅与阿斯拜丝似乎有血缘关系，但如果有人见到因森蒂娅·巴斯塔·库尔达的话，恐怕绝对想象不到她的前任行商浪人是那样的人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你知道因森蒂娅差点脱口而出谁的名字，是阿斯拜丝·库尔达。她是科罗努斯扩区的行商浪人， 也是臭名昭著的劫掠者，极其无情、贪婪，与普通的海盗与异端分子几乎没什么不一样。因森蒂娅与阿斯拜丝似乎有血缘关系，但如果有人见到因森蒂娅·巴斯塔·库尔达的话，恐怕绝对想象不到她的前任行商浪人是那样的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weißt, wessen Namen Incendia fast ausgesprochen hätte ... du hast ihn in deinem {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}früheren Leben{/d} mehr als einmal gehört. Aspyce Chorda, eine Freihändlerin der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Eine Plünderin, die für ihre Gnadenlosigkeit und Habgier bekannt war und sich kaum von einer gewöhnlichen Piratin und Ketzerin unterschieden hat. Man würde es nie glauben, wenn man Incendia Bastaal-Chorda ansieht, doch offenbar sind sie und Aspyce verwandt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weißt, wessen Namen Incendia fast ausgesprochen hätte. Aspyce Chorda, eine Freihändlerin der Koronus-Ausdehnung. Eine Plünderin, die für ihre Gnadenlosigkeit und Habgier bekannt war und sich kaum von einer gewöhnlichen Piratin und Ketzerin unterschieden hat. Man würde es nie glauben, wenn man Incendia Bastaal-Chorda ansieht, doch offenbar sind sie und Aspyce verwandt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sabes qué nombre estaba a punto de pronunciar Incendia, ya que lo has oído más de una vez en tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}profesión anterior{/d}. Aspyce Chorda, la Comerciante Independiente de la Extensión de Koronus. Una infame, despiadada y avariciosa saqueadora que se podría comparar con un simple pirata o hereje. Nadie lo diría al ver a Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, pero, por lo visto, está emparentada con Aspyce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sabes qué nombre estaba a punto de pronunciar Incendia. Aspyce Chorda, la Comerciante Independiente de la Extensión de Koronus. Una infame, despiadada y ávara saqueadora que se podría comparar con un simple pirata o hereje. Nadie lo diría al ver a Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, pero, por lo visto, está emparentada con Aspyce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}インセンディアが口にしかけた名前は知っていた。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}過去{/d}において、何度か耳にしたことがあった。アスパイス・コーダ、コロヌス・エクスパンスの自由開拓者だ。普通の海賊や異端者とほとんど変わらない、悪名高き無慈悲で貪欲な略奪者である。インセンディア・バスタール・チョーダを見てもそうは思えないが、彼女とアスパイスには血の繋がりがあるらしい。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアが口にしかけた名前は知っていた。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}過去{/d}において、何度か耳にしたことがあった。アスパイス・コーダ、コロヌス・エクスパンスの自由開拓者だ。普通の海賊や異端者とほとんど変わらない、悪名高き無慈悲で貪欲な略奪者である。インセンディア・バスタール・チョーダを見てもそうは思えないが、彼女とアスパイスには血の繋がりがあるらしい。{/n}

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın tam söyleyecekken yarıda kestiği adı biliyorsun. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Eski yaşantında{/d} defalarca duymuştun. Aspyce Chorda, Koronus Enginliği'nde bir Hür Tacir'di. Sıradan bir korsan ve kâfirden pek de farklı olmayan, acımasız ve açgözlü, meşhur bir yağmacıydı. İncendia Bastaal-Chorda'ya bakınca insanın aklından geçmez ama anlaşılan Aspyce ile İncendia akrabalar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You know whose name Incendia almost uttered — you have heard it in your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}former life{/d} more than once. Aspyce Chorda, a Rogue Trader of the Koronus Expanse. An infamously merciless and avaricious pillager who was scarcely different from a common pirate and heretic. One would never think so by looking at Incendia Bastaal-Chorda, but it appears that she and Aspyce are related.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İncendia'nın tam söyleyecekken yarıda kestiği adı biliyorsun. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Eski yaşantında{/d} defalarca duymuştun. Aspyce Chorda, Koronus Enginliği'nde bir Hür Tacir'di. Sıradan bir korsan ve kâfirden pek de farklı olmayan, acımasız ve açgözlü, meşhur bir yağmacıydı. İncendia Bastaal-Chorda'ya bakınca insanın aklından geçmez ama anlaşılan Aspyce ile İncendia akrabalar.{/n}
